ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Dr. John Klena and Cannon Deborah for helping in the analysis and interpretation of the serology results. We thank district health teams of Kamwenge, Ibanda and Luweero districts, Atuhaire Collins, Sam Twongyeirwe and Apollo Bogere David for field assistance.

sec.title: Disclaimer
sec.p: “The opinions expressed by authors contributing to this article do not necessarily reflect the opinions of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention or the institutions with which the authors are affiliated.”
